channel.title: wikipedia on {code that works}
channel.description: Recent content in wikipedia on {code that works}

item.title: Wikipedia Page Hopping
item.description: I have realized that like most users of Wikipedia, I do a lot of Wikipedia page-hopping [1]. Wikipedia is sort of addictive that way. You start reading about a piece of Flamenco music and after twenty minutes find yourself staring at the page about ETA, a Basque nationalist organization. So I decided to figure out how I exactly do I get lost in the huge list of interconnected articles. I use Chromium, and it stores its history in a SQLite3 database file.
